item.description:
We will walk through the historic part of Chestnut Hill, admiring all the fine homes and expensive cars!

We will get a taste of nature by walking through Hammond Pond Reservation.
Park in the parking lot of "The Mall at Chestnut Hill". Meet inside the mall in front Cafe Vanille.
Need a ride? Please ask for a ride from another participant in your rsvp, indicating what area you are in. If you don't find a ride that way, send me an email and I will pick you up at the Chestnut Hill T station.

Hammond Pond, a wooded reservation with a large, scenic pond, is located in the Chestnut Hill section of Newton adjacent to the city's Webster Conservation Area. It is a natural forest with wooded trails and large geological formations. Nearby Lost Pond has a quaking bog and system of natural trails. Deer Park!! - Mrs. Webster brought a couple of dozen deer into the area many years ago. Today, a small herd occupies an enclosed area of six acres. Rich and famous...

http://www.newtoncons...



afterward you can choose from either the brunch or lunch menus at Papa Razzi's, I have a reservation.
http://www.bbrginc.co...

Chestnut Hill Mall, 199 Boylston Street, Chestnut Hill, MA (617) 527-6600
item.name: Lifestyles of the rich & famous walk
